traits.Numbing Aura: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must make a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Constitution saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature can't make more than one attack, or take a bonus action on that turn.
traits.Undead Fortitude: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire, radiant, or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.Multiattack: The zombie makes two weapon attacks.
actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Hurl Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Freezing Stare: The zombie targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
